channel.title: Emojis on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in Emojis on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: Happy World Emoji Day: an analysis of rOpenSci's Slack emojis
item.description: HAPPY world emoji day! 🌏 🐔 📆 In honor of this momentous occasion, I have decided to analyze the emojis used on rOpenSci’s Slack. library("dplyr") ⊕If you’d like to follow along, go fetch yourself a Slack token. token <- "MY_SLACK_API_TOKEN" ## stick your token here We will first use Slack’s reactions.list method. ⊕Notice here I am pulling the items from the response and then from each item I am interested in the message reactions.

item.title: runconf17, an analysis of emoji use
item.description: I had such a delightful time at rOpenSci’s unconference last week. ⊕21 📦 were produced! Not only was it extremely productive, but in between the crazy productivity was some epic community building. Stefanie kicked the conference off with ice breakers, where we explored topics ranging from #rcatladies & #rdogfellas ⊕for the record, I’m an #rchickenlady, IT’S HAPPENING to impostor syndrome. It was an excellent way to get conversations starting! work Karthik and I worked on two packages:
